title: Assert Object Keys Are Valid
description: In this lab, we will learn how to validate all the keys in an object and ensure they match a given set of keys. We will make use of the Object.keys() method to get the keys of the object and then use Array.prototype.every() and Array.prototype.includes() to validate each key. This lab will help you to write more efficient and error-free code when working with objects in JavaScript.

meta.title: Validate Object Keys in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to validate all the keys in a JavaScript object and ensure they match a given set of keys.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, validation, object, keys, javascript lab, javascript tutor, programming

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
